description.zh-cn: 1889年1月30日，奥匈帝国皇太子鲁道夫及其情妇玛丽亚·费瑟拉在梅耶林猎宫殉情的事件。
description.en: An event on January 30, 1889, in which Crown Prince Rudolf of Austria-Hungary and his mistress Baroness Mary Vetsera died in a suicide pact at the Mayerling hunting lodge.

nodes.id: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

zh-cn: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

description.zh-cn: 奥地利皇帝弗朗茨·约瑟夫一世和伊丽莎白皇后的独子，奥匈帝国皇位的继承人，在梅耶林惨案中与情妇殉情。
description.en: The only son of Emperor Franz Joseph I and Empress Elisabeth of Austria, and heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary. He died in a suicide pact with his mistress in the Mayerling incident.

description.zh-cn: 奥匈帝国皇太子鲁道夫的情妇，在梅耶林惨案中与鲁道夫一同自杀。
description.en: The mistress of Crown Prince Rudolf of Austria-Hungary, who died with him in a suicide pact during the Mayerling incident.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利皇帝，鲁道夫皇太子的父亲。他命令鲁道夫与玛丽亚·费瑟拉断绝关系。
description.en: Emperor of Austria and father of Crown Prince Rudolf. He ordered Rudolf to end his relationship with Mary Vetsera.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利皇后，鲁道夫皇太子的母亲。
description.en: Empress of Austria and mother of Crown Prince Rudolf.

description.zh-cn: 比利时国王利奥波德二世的女儿，鲁道夫皇太子的妻子。
description.en: Daughter of King Leopold II of Belgium and wife of Crown Prince Rudolf.

description.zh-cn: 比利时国王，斯蒂芬妮公主的父亲。
description.en: King of the Belgians and father of Princess Stéphanie.

nodes.id: 伊丽莎白·玛丽女大公 (奥地利)

zh-cn: 伊丽莎白·玛丽女大公 (奥地利)

description.zh-cn: 鲁道夫皇太子和斯蒂芬妮公主的独生女。
description.en: The only child of Crown Prince Rudolf and Princess Stéphanie.

description.zh-cn: 罗马天主教会教宗，鲁道夫曾向其请求解除婚姻关系，但他将此事告知了皇帝弗朗茨·约瑟夫一世。
description.en: Head of the Catholic Church to whom Rudolf appealed for an annulment of his marriage, but who instead informed Emperor Franz Joseph I.

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·约瑟夫一世的弟弟，在鲁道夫死后成为推定继承人但很快放弃了继承权。
description.en: The younger brother of Emperor Franz Joseph I. He became heir presumptive after Rudolf's death but renounced his succession rights shortly thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·路德维希大公的长子，在其父放弃继承权后成为奥匈帝国推定继承人，后于萨拉热窝被刺杀，引发第一次世界大战。
description.en: The eldest son of Archduke Karl Ludwig. He became the heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne after his father renounced his rights. His assassination in Sarajevo triggered World War I.

description.zh-cn: 塞尔维亚民族主义者，于1914年6月28日刺杀了弗朗茨·斐迪南大公。
description.en: A Serbian nationalist who assassinated Archduke Franz Ferdinand on June 28, 1914.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·路德维希大公之孙，在弗朗茨·斐迪南大公被刺后成为推定继承人，后登基为奥匈帝国末代皇帝。
description.en: Grandson of Archduke Karl Ludwig. He became the heir presumptive after the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand and later ascended the throne as the last Emperor of Austria-Hungary.

description.zh-cn: 鲁道夫皇太子的仆人，是发现鲁道夫和玛丽亚尸体的人之一。
description.en: Crown Prince Rudolf's valet, one of the individuals who discovered the bodies of Rudolf and Mary.

description.zh-cn: 由奥地利帝国和匈牙利王国组成的二元君主国，梅耶林惨案发生于该国。
description.en: A dual monarchy consisting of the Austrian Empire and the Kingdom of Hungary, where the Mayerling incident took place.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利阿兰市的一个村庄，梅耶林惨案的发生地。
description.en: A village in the municipality of Alland, Austria, and the site of the Mayerling incident.

relationships.source: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

description.zh-cn: 鲁道夫与玛丽亚·费瑟拉是情妇关系，两人于1888年11月5日在霍夫堡皇宫开始发展恋情。
description.en: Rudolf and Mary Vetsera were lovers; their affair began on November 5, 1888, at the Hofburg Palace.

relationships.target: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

description.zh-cn: 鲁道夫皇太子在梅耶林惨案中自杀身亡。
description.en: Crown Prince Rudolf died by suicide in the Mayerling incident.

description.zh-cn: 玛丽亚·费瑟拉在梅耶林惨案中与鲁道夫一同自杀身亡。
description.en: Mary Vetsera died by suicide with Rudolf in the Mayerling incident.

relationships.source: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

description.zh-cn: 鲁道夫是弗朗茨·约瑟夫一世的独子。
description.en: Rudolf was the only son of Franz Joseph I.

relationships.source: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

description.zh-cn: 鲁道夫是伊丽莎白皇后的独子。
description.en: Rudolf was the only son of Empress Elisabeth.

relationships.source: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

description.zh-cn: 鲁道夫于1881年5月10日与比利时的斯蒂芬妮结婚。
description.en: Rudolf married Princess Stéphanie of Belgium on May 10, 1881.

relationships.source: 伊丽莎白·玛丽女大公 (奥地利)
relationships.target: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

description.zh-cn: 伊丽莎白·玛丽女大公是鲁道夫的独生女。
description.en: Archduchess Elisabeth Marie was Rudolf's only child.

description.zh-cn: 比利时的斯蒂芬妮是利奥波德二世国王的女儿。
description.en: Princess Stéphanie was the daughter of King Leopold II.

relationships.target: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·约瑟夫一世召见鲁道夫，以继承权为要挟，命令他与玛丽亚·费瑟拉断绝关系。
description.en: Franz Joseph I summoned Rudolf and, threatening his right of succession, ordered him to end his relationship with Mary Vetsera.

relationships.source: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

description.zh-cn: 鲁道夫曾写信给教宗良十三世，请求解除他与斯蒂芬妮公主的婚姻关系。
description.en: Rudolf wrote to Pope Leo XIII requesting an annulment of his marriage to Princess Stéphanie.

description.zh-cn: 教宗良十三世将鲁道夫请求解除婚姻关系一事告知了弗朗茨·约瑟夫一世皇帝。
description.en: Pope Leo XIII informed Emperor Franz Joseph I of Rudolf's request for a marriage annulment.

relationships.target: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

description.zh-cn: 鲁道夫皇太子死后，其叔父卡尔·路德维希大公成为奥匈帝国皇位的推定继承人。
description.en: After the death of Crown Prince Rudolf, his uncle Archduke Karl Ludwig became the heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·路德维希大公是弗朗茨·约瑟夫一世皇帝的弟弟。
description.en: Archduke Karl Ludwig was the younger brother of Emperor Franz Joseph I.

description.zh-cn: 在成为推定继承人几天后，卡尔·路德维希大公放弃继承权，将其转给长子弗朗茨·斐迪南大公。
description.en: A few days after becoming the heir presumptive, Archduke Karl Ludwig renounced his succession rights in favor of his eldest son, Archduke Franz Ferdinand.

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·斐迪南大公是卡尔·路德维希大公的长子。
description.en: Archduke Franz Ferdinand was the eldest son of Archduke Karl Ludwig.

description.zh-cn: 加夫里洛·普林齐普于1914年6月28日刺杀了弗朗茨·斐迪南大公。
description.en: Gavrilo Princip assassinated Archduke Franz Ferdinand on June 28, 1914.

description.zh-cn: 加夫里洛·普林齐普刺杀弗朗茨·斐迪南大公，导致卡尔一世成为皇位推定继承人。
description.en: Gavrilo Princip's assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand led to Charles I becoming the heir presumptive to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔一世是卡尔·路德维希大公的孙子。
description.en: Charles I was the grandson of Archduke Karl Ludwig.
